select TB_USER.ID,USERNAME,UNAME,PHONE,REGISTER_TIME as REGISTERTIME,AGE,SEX,IMG from TB_USER,TB_ACCOUNT where TB_USER.ID = TB_ACCOUNT.UID
and PHONE like concat("%",#{phone},"%")
and UNAME like concat("%",#{uname},"%")
and ( UNAME like concat("%",#{uname},"%") or PHONE like concat("%",#{phone},"%") )
limit #{page}, #{limit}

select count(USERNAME) from TB_USER,TB_ACCOUNT where TB_USER.ID = TB_ACCOUNT.UID
and PHONE like concat("%",#{phone},"%")
and UNAME like concat("%",#{uname},"%")
and ( UNAME like concat("%",#{uname},"%") or PHONE like concat("%",#{phone},"%") )
